title: Gated 2,000 sqft 4-bedroom+Loft house with Dual Master bedrooms
posting_body: ['Great deal in the southwest in master-planned Southern Highlands.', 'Charming gated community just off of Cactus and Southern Highlands Pkwy.', '4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms and a 2-car garage.', 'Smaller family room and dining room downstairs + bonus Loft upstairs.', 'Upgrades include ceramic tile floors, upgraded fixtures and ceiling fans, plush carpeting in bedrooms, built-in alarm system and more.', 'Upgraded kitchen with Maple-wood cabinets, granite countertops, pantry and S/S appliances.', 'Downstairs master suite with walk-in closet.', '3 more bedrooms & smaller loft upstairs including a second master-sized bedroom with walk-in closet and a 3rd larger (15x12) bedroom.', 'Upstairs bedrooms share a full bathroom.', 'Upstairs laundry room with washer and dryer.', 'Cozy backyard with desert landscaping, large trees and artificial grass.', '1-year lease minimum.', 'NO PETS per owner.', 'Available now.', 'Rent: $2,100/mo.', 'Security deposit: $2,100', 'App.fee: $75/person (3x income, clean rental history and 650+ FICO credit score)', 'For more information or to schedule a showing please call', 'show contact info', 'If you get my voicemail, please leave a detailed message.', 'Thank you', 'Specializing in Silverado Ranch - Anthem - Green Valley real estate', 'American Realty and Property Mgmt.', 'Keyword:', 'Cactus twilight']
